member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.FileLoggerExtensions
member.summary: Extends with methods for configuring file logging.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.FileLoggerExtensions.AddFile(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationSection)
member.summary: Adds a file logger initialized from the supplied configuration section.
member.param: The logger factory.
A configuration section with file parameters.
member.returns: A logger factory to allow further configuration.

member.summary: Adds a file logger initialized from the supplied configuration section.
member.param: The logger factory.
Filname to write. The filename may include {Date} to specify how the date portion of the filename is calculated. May include environment variables.
The level below which events will be suppressed (the default is ).
A dictionary mapping logger name prefixes to minimum logging levels.
If true, the log file will be written in JSON format.
The maximum size, in bytes, to which any single log file will be allowed to grow. For unrestricted growth, pass null. The default is 1 GB.
The maximum number of log files that will be retained, including the current log file. For unlimited retention, pass null. The default is 31.
The template used for formatting plain text log output. The default is "{Timestamp:o} {RequestId,13} [{Level:u3}] {Message} ({EventId:x8}){NewLine}{Exception}"
member.returns: A logger factory to allow further configuration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.FileLoggerExtensions.AddFile(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggingBuilder,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary: Adds a file logger initialized from the supplied configuration section.
member.param: The logging builder.
A configuration section with file parameters.
member.returns: The logging builder to allow further configuration.

member.summary: Adds a file logger initialized from the supplied configuration section.
member.param: The logging builder.
Filname to write. The filename may include {Date} to specify how the date portion of the filename is calculated. May include environment variables.
The level below which events will be suppressed (the default is ).
A dictionary mapping logger name prefixes to minimum logging levels.
If true, the log file will be written in JSON format.
The maximum size, in bytes, to which any single log file will be allowed to grow. For unrestricted growth, pass null. The default is 1 GB.
The maximum number of log files that will be retained, including the current log file. For unlimited retention, pass null. The default is 31.
The template used for formatting plain text log output. The default is "{Timestamp:o} {RequestId,13} [{Level:u3}] {Message} ({EventId:x8}){NewLine}{Exception}"
member.returns: The logging builder to allow further configuration.

member.name: T:Serilog.Extensions.Logging.File.FileLoggingConfiguration
member.summary: Configuration for the Serilog file logging.

member.name: P:Serilog.Extensions.Logging.File.FileLoggingConfiguration.PathFormat
member.summary: Filename to write. The filename may include {Date} to specify how the date portion of the filename is calculated. May include environment variables.

member.name: P:Serilog.Extensions.Logging.File.FileLoggingConfiguration.Json
member.summary: If true, the log file will be written in JSON format.

member.name: P:Serilog.Extensions.Logging.File.FileLoggingConfiguration.FileSizeLimitBytes
member.summary: The maximum size, in bytes, to which any single log file will be allowed to grow. For unrestricted growth, pass null. The default is 1 GiB.

member.name: P:Serilog.Extensions.Logging.File.FileLoggingConfiguration.RetainedFileCountLimit
member.summary: The maximum number of log files that will be retained, including the current log file. For unlimited retention, pass null. The default is 31.

member.name: P:Serilog.Extensions.Logging.File.FileLoggingConfiguration.OutputTemplate
member.summary: The template used for formatting plain text log output. The default is "{Timestamp:o} {RequestId,13} [{Level:u3}] {Message} ({EventId:x8}){NewLine}{Exception}"
